title: Prepping the Chicken Coop for Winter ~ FAIL

subtasks: Determine placement for chicken wire in chicken run
Consider predator prevention in chicken coop
Utilize tarps for insulation in winter chicken coop
Plan to replace tarp for chicken coop and pigs
Greet and interact with pigs (e.g., get to know them)
Check on pigs' living conditions (e.g., sleeping, settling in)

tasks.task: Manage chicken coop entry and exit
subtasks: Let chickens out of the coop
Encourage chickens to stay within the designated area
Introduce Icelandic chickens to the winter chicken coop
Observe chickens interacting with the area (e.g., scratching, eating)
Note the enjoyment of cold weather preparations
Express gratitude for self-sufficiency and future plans
